title: Power interruption schedule for tomorrow announced
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) says it has approved the Ceylon Electricity Board’s request to impose power cuts lasting 3 hours and 20 minutes for Tuesday (May 09).
Areas ABCDEFGHIJKLPQRSTUVW – Two hours between 9.00 a.m. and 5.00 p.m. / One hour and 20 minutes between 5.00 p.m. and 9.00 p.m.
